default.task_description: Arrange temporary accommodation (AirBNB, hotel) for the first few nights
default.importance_explanation: Having a place to stay immediately upon arrival provides stability while you handle initial logistics.

default.task_description: Confirm temporary accommodations before travelling
default.importance_explanation: Double-checking your booking prevents unexpected issues upon arrival.

default.task_description: Ensure all bags are packed accordingly with essentials needed before shipping arrives
default.importance_explanation: Packing essential items in your checked or carry-on luggage ensures you have immediate access to necessities like toiletries, medications, and a change of clothes.

default.task_description: Prepare a travel pouch with all required documents needed for immigration and arrival
default.importance_explanation: Keeping all critical travel and immigration documents together and easily accessible is vital for clearing customs and navigating arrival procedures.

default.task_description: Confirm flight times and ensure enough time between customs and any layovers
default.importance_explanation: Verifying flight details and connection times minimizes the risk of missing flights due to delays or lengthy immigration processes.

default.task_description: Allow time for final packing and securing your current residence on travel day
default.importance_explanation: Ensure your home is secure, final packing is complete, and you have enough time to get to the airport or departure point without rushing.

default.task_description: Confirm all insurance policies are accurate and active before leaving
default.importance_explanation: Double-checking your travel, health, and property insurance ensures you have coverage from the moment you depart.

default.task_description: Check that you are not carrying any disallowed items for transit or import
default.importance_explanation: Reviewing customs regulations for prohibited items prevents confiscation and potential penalties upon arrival.

default.task_description: Ensure you have readily accessible funds (cash or accessible banking) for initial expenses
default.importance_explanation: Having local currency or access to funds is essential for transportation, food, and unforeseen costs immediately upon arrival.

default.task_description: Ensure all tasks for pre-departure are completed
default.importance_explanation: Completing all necessary pre-departure steps ensures you are fully prepared for the complexities of international relocation.

default.task_description: Ensure you have all needed medication and documentation for customs/travel
default.importance_explanation: Having necessary medications and accompanying prescriptions or doctor's notes is crucial for health and clearing customs.

pets.task_description: Confirm the details and arrangements for pet travel with the agency/airline
pets.importance_explanation: Verifying all pet travel logistics ensures a smooth and safe journey for your animals.

pets.task_description: Prepare pet for travel (final health check if required, appropriate carrier, food/water for journey)
pets.importance_explanation: Ensuring your pet is comfortable and has necessary supplies for the journey is vital for their well-being.

Children.task_description: Pack an extended travel bag with essentials and entertainment for children
Children.importance_explanation: Having easy access to items like snacks, toys, medications, and comfort items makes the travel day much smoother for children.

Children.task_description: Explain the travel process to children in an age-appropriate way
Children.importance_explanation: Preparing children emotionally for the travel day can help reduce anxiety and make the experience more positive.
